NewsArticle.Title: The Loures Pig Chase
NewsArticle.Content:
"Bored with just sitting on his throne, King Bruce has decided to host a pig chasing event in the Lover's Maze Garden. Any Aisling that can successfuly capture a male and female piglet will receive a legend mark and a Star Medal."
-Jay, Loures Court Jester
((This event will begin on Tuesday, November 11th and will be for registered players only))
